The Benefits Analyst position analyzes risk for benefit offerings, determines policy terms and calculates premiums based on established actuarial factors; coordinates internal and external new and renewal group on-boarding functions; responds to benefit, plan availability, and related product questions posed by the broker and/or the administrator; manages the related client databases that store individual group information; collects, analyzes and summarizes benefit data from the existing block, other carriers and/or new and renewing groups (including plan design reviews, premiums, claims experience, and utilization activity) providing reporting to internal and external departments based on the agreed upon frequency.
